original: 將軍威名在外，<color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color>莫靠兵士之力，獨鬥方顯大將威風！(選擇拒絕將減少我方士氣值200)
text: The general's prestige is out of the question, <color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color> don't rely on the strength of soldiers, fight alone will show the power of the general! (Choose to refuse will reduce our morale by 200)
